app_descript:
myBupa

Brief:

myBupa is an all-encompassing health insurance management tool designed to streamline the experience of Bupa members. This application allows users to effortlessly access a digital version of their Bupa membership card, oversee their cover details, and manage claims with ease. It's a must-have companion for anyone enrolled in Bupa's insurance services, offering a convenient way to handle your health insurance affairs.

Please be aware that the availability of features can vary based on the insurance product you hold with Bupa. The app also emphasizes that it should not be used for emergency medical services.

*Please note: not all customers are able to view their Extras Usage on myBupa as this feature is not extended to all products at this time. ** This excludes OSHC customers.
